General.Name: EasyToken
General.Description: BeEasy is a multi-purpose blockchain ecosystem designed for mining, trading, and managing cryptocurrency investments. It features an all-in-one personal account that enables users to use the wide spectrum of their tools which include an interface for mining and receiving products and services, a multicurrency pool, an exchange with advanced features and a donation solution.

ICO.Description:
BeEasy is a multi-purpose blockchain ecosystem designed for mining, trading, and managing cryptocurrency investments. It features an all-in-one personal account that enables users to use the wide spectrum of their tools which include an interface for mining and receiving products and services, a multicurrency pool, an exchange with advanced features and a donation solution.

 

Team:

  • Aleksandr Bespalov: CEO 
  • Ilya Surodeykin: COO 
  • Nikita Polikarpov: CTO 
  • Elena Ryabukha: Head of EasyTrade

The BeEasy ICO has started on the first of February and will last until the 30th of April, 2018. The ICO token allocation represents 80% of the total token supply and will be available for a 0.02 BTC base price. The ICO funding target is set at 3200 BTC. 

Token Reserve Split (20%):

  • 17.6% geared to the project itself (supporting the advisory board, the team, working on bonuses, etc.)
  • 2.4% Bounties

The ETKN ICO features bonus and bounties.

Bonus Structure:

Pre-ICO stage:

  • First fay: 1 ETKN = 0.01 BTC
  • From the second day throughout the first week: 1ETKN = 0.011 BTC
  • Second week: 1ETKN = 0.012 BTC
  • Third week: 1ETKN = 0.013 BTC
  • Fourth week: 1ETKN = 0.014 BTC
  • Fifth & Sixth weeks: 1ETKN = 0.015 BTC

ICO stage:

  • Equal throughout the ICO stage: 1ETKN = 0.02 BTC

 

20% geared to the project itself (supporting the advisory board, the team, working on bonuses, etc.)
